name: Bourbon: Manhattan
description: A Manhattan is generally made with rye whiskey. Here we’re using its sweeter cousin, bourbon, with a splash of sweet vermouth. You’ll see precise measurements. But use this recipe as a guideline, and customize according to your preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 2 tablespoons sweet vermouth to the ice and whiskey and gently stir; strain into a glass. Garnish: Maraschino cherry.
